act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 周六我要和几个同学一起做一个项目。
item.pinyin: Zhōuliù wǒ yào hé jǐ ge péngyou yīqǐ zuò yī ge xiàngmù.

item.hanzi: 周日呢？周日我们一起去看电影吧？
item.pinyin: Zhōurì ne? Zhōurì wǒmen yīqǐ qù kàn diànyǐng ba?

item.hanzi: 对不起，到周日我肯定累极了。我想休息。
item.pinyin: Duìbuqǐ, dào zhōurì wǒ kěndìng lèi jí le. Wǒ xiǎng xiūxi.
